typeSystemDescription.name: ModelObject
typeSystemDescription.description: This represents model data. It contains text, model file names, and any other information that we might need to perform an analysis.

featureDescription.name: ModelFile
featureDescription.description: Use this model file to process data.

featureDescription.name: IdArray
featureDescription.description: This is a corresponding id array. This exists because only primitives (no Entry<> types) are allowed within the xml.
